project.description: triggered by Submit in project C450-linux-kernel 1. compile kernel on project C450-linux-kernel 2. copy the binaries created from previous step to android directory 3. enter to android directory and create from the binaries --> uimage-dtb 4. compile full android 5. create new commit in project: IPP/Android/device_dspg_dvg101-kernel with the new binaries and update the submodule to current change (PATCHSET_REVISION) 6. push commit directly to git

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
# we build only if jenkins checked out on the last commit in branch, else exit 0 LastGerritCommitHash=$( git ls-remote | grep refs/heads/$GERRIT_BRANCH | cut -f 1 | head -n 1 ) echo $LastGerritCommitHash echo $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION if [[ "$LastGerritCommitHash" == "$GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION" ]] then file_path="${WORKSPACE}/binaries_list.txt" #compile c450hd kernel source make_c450hd_kernel.sh
# enter android folder cd ../ipp-android rm -f *.zip repo init -u ssh://jenkins@gerrit:29418/IPP/Android/repo_manifests -b master repo sync -c --no-tags --no-clone-bundle -j16 --force-sync
#copy all files from list to android dir (ipp-android-review/....) tail -n +1 ${file_path} | while IFS= read -r line do sourcePath=$(echo $line | cut -d' ' -f1) sourcePath=${WORKSPACE}/${sourcePath} destPath=$(echo $line | cut -d' ' -f2) destPath=${destPath} cp ${sourcePath} ${destPath} done
uImage_filename=$(cat ${file_path} | head -1 | tail -1) uImage_filename=$(echo $uImage_filename | cut -d' ' -f1) uImage_filename=${uImage_filename##*/} dvf101_filename=$(cat ${file_path} | head -2 | tail -1) dvf101_filename=$(echo $dvf101_filename | cut -d' ' -f1) dvf101_filename=${dvf101_filename##*/} cat device/dspg/c450hd-kernel/${uImage_filename} device/dspg/c450hd-kernel/divider.txt device/dspg/c450hd-kernel/${dvf101_filename} > device/dspg/c450hd-kernel/uImage-dtb
#run android compilation ./build/tools/make.sh --zip-images --clean
#clone IPP/Android/device_dspg_dvg101-kernel repository and create there a new commit cd ${WORKSPACE} if [[ -e device_dspg_dvf101-kernel ]] then rm -rf device_dspg_dvf101-kernel fi git clone ssh://jenkins@gerrit:29418/IPP/Android/device_dspg_dvf101-kernel cd device_dspg_dvf101-kernel git checkout master || echo "already on master" #update submodule to the current GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION of this change git submodule init git submodule update cd Source git checkout ${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION} cd ..
#copy files to IPP/Android/device_dspg_dvg101-kernel tail -n +1 ${file_path} | while IFS= read -r line do sourcePath=$(echo $line | cut -d' ' -f1) sourcePath=${WORKSPACE}/${sourcePath} cp ${sourcePath} . done cat ${uImage_filename} divider.txt ${dvf101_filename} > uImage-dtb
#get all commit messages between the last commit in IPP/Android/device_dspg_dvg101-kernel (${commitToCompareWith}) to #all commits that were submitted in IPP/C450/C450-linux-kernel commit_msg_in_kernel=$(git log --format=%s -n 1 HEAD) commitToCompareWith=$(echo $commit_msg_in_kernel | cut -d':' -f2-) commitToCompareWith=$(echo $commitToCompareWith | sed -e 's/^[ \t]*//') commiterName=$(echo $commit_msg_in_kernel | cut -d':' -f1) #enter to C450-linux-kernel to check all the commits messages that submited cd .. index=1 commit_msg=$(git log --format=%s -n 1 HEAD~0) last_commit="${GERRIT_CHANGE_OWNER_NAME}: ${commit_msg}" commitMsgs="" #add all the commits messages to String until it will be equal to the last commit in IPP/Android/device_dspg_dvg101-kernel while [[ "${commit_msg}" != "${commitToCompareWith}" ]] do commit_msg=$(git log --format=%s -n 1 HEAD~${index}) commiterName=$(git log --format=%an -n 1 HEAD~${index}) ((index+=1)) if [[ "${commit_msg}" != "${commitToCompareWith}" ]] then commitMsgs="$(printf "${commitMsgs}\n${commiterName}: ${commit_msg}")" fi done echo "******************************" printf '%s' "$commitMsgs" echo "******************************"
#create the new commit cd device_dspg_dvf101-kernel git add . git commit -m "${last_commit}" -m "${commitMsgs}" git push
else echo "****************** This is not the last commit, Exit the Build ******************" fi
